Title: I Can't Leave Her
Writer: Lilly Wachowski (created by), Lana Wachowski (created by), J. Michael Straczynski (created by), Lilly Wachowski, Lana Wachowski, J. Michael Straczynski
Actors: Aml Ameen, Doona Bae, Jamie Clayton, Tina Desai
Plot: With Riley in the hands of Whispers, all of the Sensates' skills are needed to give them any chance of survival.
